A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this is quite frankly the worst star wars movie. visually just like every star wars movie it's spectacular. the choreography\, story\, writing\, plot\, story arcs.... or lack there of.... it doesn't follow the lore of the universe. it didn't follow a single plot point from 7. the worst sequel I've ever seen. and I've seen speed 2. zero character development. if you just came to watch something that looks cool. this movie is for you... but just put aside any hopes for character development or plot.
